abstract: Lawyers for Bridget Anne Kelly and Bill Baroni, former allies of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, file complaint against prosecutors and Christie's lawyers for failing to provide documents related to lane closings on George Washington Bridge; Kelly and Baroni have been indicted for conspiracy and fraud for their involvement in 2013 lane closings.
lead_paragraph: The lawyers filed complaints to the United States District Court in Newark in response to the May indictments of Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly.

headline.main: Ex-Allies of Christie Didn’t Receive Evidence in Lane Closings Case, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Say Ex-Allies of Christie Didn’t Get Evidence in Lane Closings Case

snippet: The lawyers filed complaints to the United States District Court in Newark in response to the May indictments of Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
